title: Store?
body: I updated the alpha client, and the first thing that i went to check was the store, but apparently its unavailable or something like that beacause the icon is grayed out and i can't click it. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Its is gray and if you hover over the letters, ~~you'll see the tooltip "not available yet"~~. It is going to be available soon though ;D

update: it was meant to be enabled with this patch, but we had to disable it temporarily, we are looking into it
Relax i'm pretty sure it will be enabled at a later time, they're prob making sure it's working as it should before enabling it.
Same here, i think its just a bug.
